alert.note: Alert for Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:23PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Payette, southwestern Washington and northeastern Malheur Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 421 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fruitland, or near Ontario, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 30 mph, half inch hail, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain could cause ponding of water on roadways. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ontario, Payette and Fruitland around 430 PM MDT. Weiser and Annex around 450 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
